name: Button
description: A reusable button component with support for different styles and sizes.

children.description: The text or elements to be displayed within the Button component.

onClick.description: Function to be called when the button is clicked.

variant.description: Defines the style variant of the button.

disabled.description: Indicates whether the button is disabled.

size.description: Defines the size of the button.
